mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.name, p.age, p.created_at, s.hired_at, d.license_code, ms.id as specialty_id, ms.name as specialty_name FROM person p JOIN staff s ON p.id = s.id JOIN doctor d ON s.id = d.staff_id JOIN medical_specialty ms ON s.specialty_id = ms.id WHERE p.id = #{id}
